description: {"blocks":[{"key":"66nod","text":"The Feline Enteric Virus Detection Assay is intended as an in vitro veterinary reagent set, based on Reverse Transcription quantitative PCR (RT-qPCR), for the detection of feline coronavirus (FCoV)/feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), feline panleukopenia virus (FPV; feline parvovirus), feline rotavirus A (FRV) and SARS-CoV-2 in rectal swabs and fecal samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"cq6h2","text":"Reference to any commercial materials, equipment, or process does not in any way constitute approval, endorsement, or recommendation by the Food and Drug Administration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"d4bn3","text":" SHIPPING \u0026 STORAGE INFORMATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2un7c","text":"The Feline Enteric Virus Detection Assay is shipped on dry ice. Reagents should arrive frozen. The Reagents in the purple and red tubes may arrive liquid, this will not result in a reduction in performance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"375gr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckh24","text":"All reagents should be stored at -20°C upon arrival. All reagents can be stored for a minimum of one year (from the date of shipment) at -20°C without showing a reduction in performance. Positive controls should be stored at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bahjp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93o2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmlvh","text":"LIMITATIONS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35rca","text":"Strict compliance with the instructions is required for optimal results.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pos","text":"Appropriate specimen collection, transport, storage, and processing procedures are required for the optimal performance of this test.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tgv5","text":"The presence of RT-PCR inhibitors may cause false negatives.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3unc4","text":"Results of Feline Enteric Viruses Detection Assay need to be interpreted in consideration of all clinical and laboratory findings.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ottq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7iasf","text":"QUALITY CONTROL:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qqo1","text":"The specificity of each test was validated using a panel of reference and related canine respiratory pathogens.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvoq5","text":"The analytical sensitivity of each assay was determined using ten-fold dilution of in vitro transcribed RNA or plasmid copies number. All assays have a limit of detection (LOD95)  35 copies/l.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"atp7g","text":"ASSAY COMPONENTS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2venk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ri9r","text":"The reagents are assembled for 60 reactions (+ 10% extra).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crv9m","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fvakm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epnjf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ophb","text":"PROBE DYE SETTING:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ngsl","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6mvs3","text":" Other Materials ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4g3j","text":" Appropriate nucleic acid extraction instrument and kits","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g93b","text":"Appropriate real-time PCR instrument calibrated for ABYTM, FAMTM, JUNTM and VICTM dyes (e.g., Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Real-time PCR machine)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":55,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":62,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":69,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":79,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aurc","text":"Vortex and benchtop centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8bl8","text":"Appropriate 96-well reaction plate or reaction tubes with corresponding closing tape or caps","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o4pc","text":"Pipettes \u0026 tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vs93","text":"Personal Protective Equipment status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dbfmg","text":"Centrifuge all reagents on a benchtop centrifuge to ensure no liquid is in cap and keep on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1sq6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5c8v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fuhvo","text":"The Feline Enteric Virus Detection Assay does not include an internal control, but positive controls are provided. A positive and a negative control should be run simultaneously with each sample setup.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ipet","text":"Select the following fluorescence channels: ABYTM, FAMTM, JUNTM and VICTM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":54,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":61,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":71,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmr0a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ilh9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":2,"offset":3,"style":"sup"}],"key":"5pkod","text":"ROXTM should be used as a passive reference dye.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dgfcu","text":"Before analysis of results, the threshold value of each fluorescent dye must be manually set in the region of exponential amplification, typically 0.1 × ΔRn value at the plateau phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adjp3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2p6q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Feline Enteric Virus Detection Assay
